description:
Hdparm is a Cygwin port of the Linux native command line tool for changing hard disk drive Advanced Power Management settings (HDD APM).

Note this is the same version as available in Cygwin.

Warning: While this is the latest port of hdparm for Windows, it was last released in 2007. Please exercise caution when using as using some options may cause data loss on certain storage devices.
author: Mark Lord,  Cygwin
